column4: I was planning to finally upgrade to Jaunty. I have a question though. I did a lot of customizing the look of my Ibex, and I was wondering is there a way I can preserve all of my settings?
why bother? Something you *need* in Jaunty?
I just want to preserve all of my settings O.o the look of my desktop took quite a long time.
and my point was: don't upgrade if you don't need to, and save yourself the potential for a lot of headaches...
ah, I figured there was fresh new stuff in Jaunty
there's always fresh stuff, but if you don't need it or won't use it...
